page.title: 09EMPLOYMENT IN CIRENCESTER
page.content: In Cirencester most of the children have Dads that are employed. Only 5 in Cirencester County Junior School are not.157 Dads are employed.There is a wide variety of places where they work but most work in Cirencester. The largest employers are{Christian Brann, {Mycalex}and the{Cotswold District {Council.}Christian Brann employs 173 people, Mycalex employs 375 people and the Council employs 400 people. Christian Brann sells advertisements. The printers start work at 6.00 am and finish at 9.00 pm. Mycalex make small electric heaters. Only ladies on the top floor wear uniforms because of the machinery. The Council looks after many things including architects and dustmen. It uses some machinery but computers are becoming the most important areas.
